summary.label:
LuxTrust Mobile – carry out your most sensitive online operations directly from your smartphone and without using any hard devices (such as the classic Token or a Scan).

WHAT DOES LUXTRUST MOBILE DO?
LuxTrust Mobile allows you to:
- Securely access our partner websites (banks, e-government, …)
- Confirm and validate online financial transactions
- Sign documents electronically directly 
- Perform various operations on guichet.lu

HOW TO ACTIVATE IT?
If you already are a LuxTrust customer and have your Token or Scan at hand, simply install it and follow the steps indicated in the app. 
If you are not a LuxTrust client and you want to use the app, order your LuxTrust electronic identity on www.luxtrust.lu. 

HOW TO USE IT?
LuxTrust has three main modes:
- App2App: Once set-up in your banking app, LuxTrust Mobile can automatically exchange with it so that you do not need to enter an OTP (one-time password). You just have to confirm or cancel the operation. Please check with your bank how to enable this feature.

- Scan the QR code (mosaic image) when connecting to a website using a desktop or tablet:  You will select LuxTrust mobile instead of the Token for instance. You can then scan the QR code displayed after entering your User ID and Password. The app decrypts the image and generates the OTP (one-time password) you need to insert on the website.

- Receive a Push Notification when accessing to our partners’ website from a desktop, tablet or smartphone. Partners’ websites having this feature enabled will automatically send you a notification asking you to confirm or cancel the specific operation. You can also find it under “Pending transactions”.

OTHER FEATURES
You can activate your LuxTrust Mobile app on a second device (like a tablet) and enable TouchID or FaceID to unlock it, for more convenience.

DO YOU NEED HELP?
If you have any questions or need help, feel free to contact our Helpdesk at +352 24 550 550 or by email at: helpdesk@luxtrust.lu.

SECURITY NOTICE
Before installation and as well as during utilisation, please ensure that your devices (smartphone, tablet, etc.) are appropriately secured and protected. For security reasons, LuxTrust do not accept rooted or jailbroken devices and cannot be held liable in case such devices are used.
To remain protect at all times, do not disclose your security codes, PINs, and passwords to anyone. 
If you suspect that your device or credentials have been compromised, stop using the app and immediately notify LuxTrust by telephone at +352 24 550 550. Our colleagues from Helpdesk will offer you support and guidance. 

ABOUT LUXTRUST
LuxTrust is leading European electronic identity and trust services provider. Certified and acting in compliance with the latest European regulations (eIDAS, PSD2, GDPR, ETSI), LuxTrust delivers digital services related to the identification and authentication (required to equip individuals with a valid electronic identity and to secure access to websites and applications) and the creation and validation of electronic signatures.

On a récemment revu tout le design de l’app avec un tout nouveau look et surtout, l’app HelloWork est encore plus complète. Appli reprise de 0 et plus fluide ? OK ! Dépôt de CV auprès des recruteurs ? OK ! Création ou modification de vos alertes email ? OK ! Vue complète de votre profil ? OK !

On a lu vos commentaires, vos encouragements comme vos remarques. Et on a décidé que comme sur le site, il était temps de vous donner toutes les fonctionnalités dont vous avez besoin pour choisir le bon job.

Cette toute nouvelle version vient donc ajouter les fonctionnalités qui vous manquaient sur l’app à commencer par la gestion de vos CVs, le dépot de CV, le pilotage de vos alertes email ou une vue complète sur votre profil.

Comme on sait que vous appréciez déjà l’app, on conserve ce qui faisait la force de la version précédente : les recommandations faites dans l’app ou via les notifications, et la simplicité de postuler en 1 clic à l’offre qui vous convient.

Pour vous anciens utilisateurs de CentreJob, EstJob, NordJob, OuestJob, PacaJob, RhôneAlpesJob et SudOuestJob, Hellowork vous accompagne en région à chaque moment de votre recherche d’emploi, de votre première recherche jusqu'à la candidature.

ACCÉDER A LA BONNE OFFRE, celle faite pour vous : en quelques instants faites votre recherche, l’app vous propose directement les meilleures offres d'emploi dans votre région.

ÊTRE INFORMÉ AVANT LES AUTRES : Vous découvrez les offres en avant-première. Dès qu’un poste qui correspond à votre profil est proposé par une entreprise, vous êtes le 1er alerté.

RÉPONDRE EN PREMIER : Répondre vite c’est la garantie d'émerger auprès des recruteurs. Vous avez alors un avantage sur les autres candidats.

NE MANQUER AUCUNE OFFRE : Alerte, notifications, vous ne raterez aucune des offres d’emploi qui vous correspondent. Vous pourrez les consulter quand vous le voulez.

SUIVRE MES CANDIDATURES : Votre app est synchronisé en live avec le site. Suivez vos candidatures et les réponses des recruteurs partout, à tout moment.

Que vous recherchiez une offre en CDI, en CDD, une alternance ou unue mission d’intérim, un emploi dans une TPE/PME ou dans une grande entreprise, Hellowork a l’offre qui vous correspond, dans de nombreux domaines : Administratif, Logistique, Informatique, Comptabilité, Ressources Humaines, Commerce, Distribution, Immobilier …

Hellowork vous permet de trouver les offres d’emploi dans votre région ou votre ville : Lyon, Marseille, Lille, Bordeaux, Strasbourg, Nantes, Rennes, Toulouse, Tours, Montpellier, Nice, Rouen, Caen et partout en France.

Vos retours sont précieux pour améliorer votre expérience et celles des autres candidats. Envoyez-nous un message à iphone@regionsjob.com, nous lisons tous vos retours.

Blind is a professional community where verified employees have honest conversations anonymously about their work-life challenges.
 
Blind has more than 7 million verified professionals at more than 300,000 companies, including:
80% of all Uber employees
70% of all corporate Amazon and Apple employees
60% of all Meta and Microsoft employees
30% of all Google employees

Things you can do on Blind:

Lots of channels to choose from
Whether you are into trending tech news, salary negotiations, job opportunities, interview preparation or series of posts around layoffs and referrals, there's a channel on Blind for you.
 
Get real with your coworkers
Be a part of the private company channel and talk about layoffs, hiring freezes, re-org, performance reviews, bonuses, company benefits, WFH, stocks, all-hands, and more.

Ask questions that you’re too afraid to ask your manager
If you need help with tough work situations, salary comparisons, career advice, offer evaluation, resume feedback, etc., you are not alone. Get real feedback and insights. 

Aiming for that dream job? 
See what the verified employees of your dream company are talking about, by following the company and get an insider scoop.

Do you want to know if you are underpaid? 
Leverage Blind’s salary comparison tool and understand how much you are worth for a specific job function across the country. 

Stay connected with fellow professionals
Have private conversations with anyone on Blind via direct messages. Reach out about referrals, interview experience, company culture, and more.

Sign up with your work email to get the most out of Blind! Protecting your anonymity is our top priority. We use work email addresses to verify your current place of work but your personal information is not collected and emails are not stored. Thereby providing you a secure platform to communicate with coworkers and fellow professionals. 

—----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Our patented infrastructure (Patent no. 10-2013-******) makes sure that all user account and activity information is completely disconnected from the encrypted email verification process. This means we are unable to retrieve forgotten passwords. You must create a new account with work email to re-access Blind.

No work email? No problem!
Sign up with your personal email, and you’ll get view-only access to limited contents. To participate in more insightful conversations, you will need to verify with a work email.
------------------------------------------------

To continue our focus on protecting the security of our users, we have restricted rooted or jailbroken devices from accessing Blind. Please remember to download the Blind app from the official App Store.
Any questions, please reach out to us at blindapp@teamblind.com.
